26 class DAOCoreTrait {
27  protected static $accessors = [ ];

29  abstract protected static function _affectsRelationObjects($className, $classPropKey, $manyToOneQueries, $oneToManyQueries, $manyToManyParsers, $objects, $included, $useCache);

39  abstract protected static function getIncludedForStep($included);

41  private static function _getOneToManyFromArray(&$ret, $array, $fkv, $elementAccessor, $prop) {
42  foreach ( $array as $element ) {
43  $elementRef = $element->$elementAccessor ();
44  if (($elementRef == $fkv) || (is_object ( $elementRef ) && Reflexion::getPropValue ( $elementRef, $prop ) == $fkv)) {
45  $ret [] = $element;
46  }
47  }
48  }
49 
50  private static function getManyToManyFromArray($instance, $array, $class, $parser) {
51  $ret = [ ];
52  $continue = true;
53  $accessorToMember = "get" . ucfirst ( $parser->getInversedBy () );
54  $myPkAccessor = "get" . ucfirst ( $parser->getMyPk () );
55  $pk = self::getFirstKeyValue_ ( $instance );
56 
57  if (sizeof ( $array ) > 0) {
58  $continue = method_exists ( current ( $array ), $accessorToMember );
59  }
60  if ($continue) {
61  foreach ( $array as $targetEntityInstance ) {
62  $instances = $targetEntityInstance->$accessorToMember ();
63  if (is_array ( $instances )) {
64  foreach ( $instances as $inst ) {
65  if ($inst->$myPkAccessor () == $pk)
66  array_push ( $ret, $targetEntityInstance );
67  }
68  }
69  }
70  } else {
71  Logger::warn ( "DAO", "L'accesseur au membre " . $parser->getInversedBy () . " est manquant pour " . $parser->getTargetEntity (), "ManyToMany" );
72  }
73  return $ret;
74  }
75 
76  protected static function getClass_($instance) {
77  if (is_object ( $instance )) {
78  return get_class ( $instance );
79  }
80  return $instance [0];
81  }
82 
83  protected static function getInstance_($instance) {
84  if (is_object ( $instance )) {
85  return $instance;
86  }
87  return $instance [0];
88  }
89 
90  protected static function getValue_($instance, $member) {
91  if (is_object ( $instance )) {
92  return Reflexion::getMemberValue ( $instance, $member );
93  }
94  return $instance [1];
95  }
96 
97  protected static function getFirstKeyValue_($instance) {
98  if (is_object ( $instance )) {
99  return OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $instance );
100  }
101  return $instance [1];
102  }
103 
104  protected static function _getOne($className, ConditionParser $conditionParser, $included, $useCache) {
105  $conditionParser->limitOne ();
106  $retour = self::_getAll ( $className, $conditionParser, $included, $useCache );
107  if (sizeof ( $retour ) < 1) {
108  return null;
109  }
110  $result = \current ( $retour );
111  EventsManager::trigger ( DAOEvents::GET_ONE, $result, $className );
112  return $result;
113  }
114 
123  protected static function _getAll($className, ConditionParser $conditionParser, $included = true, $useCache = NULL) {
124  $included = self::getIncludedForStep ( $included );
125  $objects = array ();
126  $invertedJoinColumns = null;
127  $oneToManyFields = null;
128  $manyToManyFields = null;
129 
130  $metaDatas = OrmUtils::getModelMetadata ( $className );
131  $tableName = $metaDatas ["#tableName"];
132  $hasIncluded = $included || (is_array ( $included ) && sizeof ( $included ) > 0);
133  if ($hasIncluded) {
134  self::_initRelationFields ( $included, $metaDatas, $invertedJoinColumns, $oneToManyFields, $manyToManyFields );
135  }
136  $condition = SqlUtils::checkWhere ( $conditionParser->getCondition () );
137  $members = \array_diff ( $metaDatas ["#fieldNames"], $metaDatas ["#notSerializable"] );
138  $transformers = $metaDatas ["#transformers"] [self::$transformerOp] ?? [ ];
139  $query = self::$db->prepareAndExecute ( $tableName, $condition, $members, $conditionParser->getParams (), $useCache );
140  $oneToManyQueries = [ ];
141  $manyToOneQueries = [ ];
142  $manyToManyParsers = [ ];
143  $propsKeys = OrmUtils::getPropKeys ( $className );
144  $accessors = $metaDatas ["#accessors"];
145  foreach ( $query as $row ) {
146  $object = self::loadObjectFromRow ( $row, $className, $invertedJoinColumns, $manyToOneQueries, $oneToManyFields, $manyToManyFields, $oneToManyQueries, $manyToManyParsers, $accessors, $transformers );
147  $key = OrmUtils::getPropKeyValues ( $object, $propsKeys );
148  $objects [$key] = $object;
149  }
150  if ($hasIncluded) {
151  $classPropKey = OrmUtils::getFirstPropKey ( $className );
152  self::_affectsRelationObjects ( $className, $classPropKey, $manyToOneQueries, $oneToManyQueries, $manyToManyParsers, $objects, $included, $useCache );
153  }
154  EventsManager::trigger ( DAOEvents::GET_ALL, $objects, $className );
155  return $objects;
156  }
157 
167  private static function loadObjectFromRow($row, $className, &$invertedJoinColumns, &$manyToOneQueries, &$oneToManyFields, &$manyToManyFields, &$oneToManyQueries, &$manyToManyParsers, &$accessors, &$transformers) {
168  $o = new $className ();
169  if (self::$useTransformers) {
170  foreach ( $transformers as $field => $transformer ) {
171  $transform = self::$transformerOp;
172  $row [$field] = $transformer::$transform ( $row [$field] );
173  }
174  }
175  foreach ( $row as $k => $v ) {
176  if (isset ( $accessors [$k] )) {
177  $accesseur = $accessors [$k];
178  $o->$accesseur ( $v );
179  }
180  $o->_rest [$k] = $v;
181  if (isset ( $invertedJoinColumns ) && isset ( $invertedJoinColumns [$k] )) {
182  $fk = "_" . $k;
183  $o->$fk = $v;
184  self::prepareManyToOne ( $manyToOneQueries, $o, $v, $fk, $invertedJoinColumns [$k] );
185  }
186  }
187  if (isset ( $oneToManyFields )) {
188  foreach ( $oneToManyFields as $k => $annot ) {
189  self::prepareOneToMany ( $oneToManyQueries, $o, $k, $annot );
190  }
191  }
192  if (isset ( $manyToManyFields )) {
193  foreach ( $manyToManyFields as $k => $annot ) {
194  self::prepareManyToMany ( $manyToManyParsers, $o, $k, $annot );
195  }
196  }
197  return $o;
198  }
199 
200  private static function parseKey(&$keyValues, $className) {
201  if (! is_array ( $keyValues )) {
202  if (strrpos ( $keyValues, "=" ) === false && strrpos ( $keyValues, ">" ) === false && strrpos ( $keyValues, "<" ) === false) {
203  $keyValues = "`" . OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $className ) . "`='" . $keyValues . "'";
204  }
205  }
206  }
207 }
